title: Cafe Kostbar
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cozy cafe in the alternative Nauwieser Quarter. International cuisine with menu changing daily, half of which is vegetarian (of which some meals are vegan or can be made vegan). Spaghetti is vegan. Sources a lot of its food grown organically in the region. Lunch 12-3pm, evening menu 6-10pm. Opening times are valid from April-December. Opening times from January-March are Mon-Fri 11:30am-1am, Sat-Sun 10am-1am. Beer garden may already open in March or April, depending on the weather.
